data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Ilinden, North Macedonia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ilinden, North Macedonia

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 8 believers in the state of Ilinden the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Ilinden, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Ilinden to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Ilinden, North Macedonia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ilinden.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ilinden, North Macedonia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the state of Ilinden, North Macedonia has a population of 5,000.

We estimate Ilinden has 8 people who might know Jesus, 3,090 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,901 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 624 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 5,000 people living in the state of Ilinden.
